recipe.name: Chicken Enchila Bake
recipe.instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 375°F. 2. In a large bowl, combine chicken, shredded cheese, sour cream, white portion of scallions and 2/3 cup of enchilada sauce 3. Coat the bottom of a 9” x 13” baking dish with a thin layer of enchilada sauce 4. Arrange eight of the tortilla halves in the bottom of the baking dish, creating two squares in each half of the baking dish 5. Spread half of the chicken mixture over the tortillas 6. Add another layer of tortilla halves 7. Spread the remaining chicken mixture over the tortillas 8. Add another layer of tortilla halves 9. Cover with enchilada sauce 10. Bake for 30-40 minutes, or until heated thoroughly 11. Top with sliced olives and remaining sliced scallions 12. Top each serving with sour cream
